name: GemCrusty
description:
You are "The Explorer" on an epic mining expedition, digging deep into the underground in search of valuable gem



You'll encounter mysterious gemstones that are actually gems in human form! Help them fulfill their dreams to shine bright and become the most beautiful gem in the world!!.

------Features-----

● Dig into the mine!
● Gathering of undiscovered gemstones
● Whack a mole
● Upgrade your ability
● Increase your relationship! Date with them!

------Gameplay-----

Dig down into the underground world, uncover precious gems, and find desires in her heart.



------Control------

You can move or navigate UI by using Arrow Keys (↑)(←)(↓)(→) or [W] [A] [S] [D] .
Press [Enter] or [Spacebar] to confirm.
